benchmark_details.name: Customer Support Conversations Dataset (CSConDa)
benchmark_details.overview: CSConDa is a high-quality benchmark comprising over 9,000 QA pairs, curated from customer interactions at a Vietnamese software company, aimed at evaluating Vietnamese Large Language Models (ViLLMs) in real-world customer support scenarios.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating Vietnamese Large Language Models (ViLLMs) in customer support applications.

data.source: Customer support interactions with human advisors at a Vietnamese software company (DooPage).
data.annotation: Manual annotation by experts with supervision from a domain expert.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the models' outputs compared to human-annotated reference answers.
methodology.validation: Systematic evaluation of 11 lightweight open-source ViLLMs using CSConDa.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Anonymization procedures applied to remove personally identifiable information.
